verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He's the
Lily of the Valley,

the Bright
and Morning Star,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I have found
a friend in Jesus,
He’s everything to me,
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The Lily of the Valley,
in Him alone I see
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: In sorrow He’s my comfort, in trouble He’s my stay,
He tells me every care on Him to roll:

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He all my griefs has taken,
and all my sorrows borne;
In temptation He’s my strong and mighty tower;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: I have all for Him forsaken,
and all my idols torn from my heart,
And now He keeps me by His power.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: Though all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore,
Through Jesus I shall safely reach the goal:

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He will never,
never leave me,
nor yet forsake me here,

While I live by faith
and do His blessed will;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
A wall of fire about me,
I’ve nothing now to fear,

With His manna
He my hungry soul shall fill.

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Then sweeping up to glory
to see His blessed face,
Where rivers of delight shall ever roll:
